hero.title: Nourishing Hope in Displaced Communities
hero.subtitle: Providing essential nutrition, food security, and health support to those who need it most.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To provide nutrition, food security programs, capacity building, and community health support to refugees and displaced persons, ensuring every individual has the foundation for a healthy future.

emergencyNutrition.title: Emergency Nutrition Packs
emergencyNutrition.desc: Culturally appropriate, nutrient-dense kits for infants, pregnant women, and the elderly.

mobileHealth.title: Mobile Health Clinics
mobileHealth.desc: Teams offering screenings, supplements, and referrals for severe malnutrition cases.

nutritionEducation.title: Nutrition Education
nutritionEducation.desc: Workshops on meal planning with limited resources, breastfeeding support, and hygiene.

schoolFeeding.title: School Feeding Programs
schoolFeeding.desc: Daily fortified meals for children in partnership with schools/NGOs.

seedToolBanks.title: Seed & Tool Banks
seedToolBanks.desc: Support urban farming in camps with drought-resistant seeds and training.

shareStory.title: Share Your Story
shareStory.subtitle: Have you been impacted by our work? We'd love to hear from you.

blogPage.title: News & Stories
blogPage.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest programs, success stories, and community impact.
blogPage.noPosts: No blog posts available at the moment.

programsPage.title: Our Programs
programsPage.subtitle: Comprehensive, sustainable interventions designed to empower and heal.

aboutPage.title: About NRDC
aboutPage.subtitle: Dedicated to restoring dignity and health to displaced communities through sustainable nutrition and support.
aboutPage.visionStatement: A world where displaced communities have the resources and support to thrive independently.
aboutPage.noTeam: No team members to display yet.

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: Have questions or want to learn more? We'd love to hear from you.

contactForm.name: Name
contactForm.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

volunteerForm.name: Full Name
volunteerForm.messageLabel: Why do you want to volunteer?
volunteerForm.successMessage: Your application has been received. We will be in touch shortly.

testimonialForm.name: Your Name *
testimonialForm.successMessage: Your testimonial has been submitted and is pending admin approval.
testimonialForm.reviewNotice: Your testimonial will be reviewed by our team before being published.

footer.aboutDesc: Nutrition for Refugees and Displaced Communities. Providing hope, health, and stability to those in need.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.subtitle: Join us in making a difference. Your time, skills, and support can change lives.
getInvolved.donateDesc: Your financial contribution directly supports our nutrition and health programs. Every dollar counts.
getInvolved.partnerDesc: We collaborate with organizations, governments, and businesses to amplify our impact.
getInvolved.volunteerDesc: Share your skills and time. We are always looking for passionate individuals to join our team.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and support our humanitarian mission. By clicking "Accept", you agree to our use of cookies. Read our
